title: Why You Should Still Learn C in 2024 and 2025
subtitle: C (a language that has been around since the 70's) has changed very little since the early 00’s. Compare that to languages like Python and JavaScript that change faster than developers that keep up with them, and it’s easy to overlook C as archaic. title: Why Hasn’t Self-Sovereign Identity Caught on Yet?
subtitle: You have an appointment with a new doctor. Like Nala striding past the hyenas in Lion King, You pass stressed-out patients with their phone in one hand, pen in the other, trying to remember where they lived in 2004. You tell the desk attendant “careful-harvest-thoughtful,” a token you generated for your SSI account. A moment later, you get a notification on your phone, asking to retrieve your first name, last name, address, and other details. You approve it. In seconds, you’re all set for your appointment. That’s one of the applications of Self-Sovereign Identity, or SSI.
